component-library.title: Storybook Component Library
component-library.subtitle: Delivered a thoroughly documented React component library that aligns design and engineering and reduces UI inconsistencies in production.
component-library.team: Product Leads, Designers, Engineers, AI Systems
component-library.tldr: I delivered a thoroughly documented React component library that aligns design and engineering and reduces UI inconsistencies in production.
component-library.problem: Even with a strong design system, teams lacked a shared implementation reference. Product Managers transitioned into Product Lead roles and were less familiar with patterns and best practices. Engineers often rebuilt components differently, creating drift between design and shipped UI.
component-library.solution:
I built a Storybook component library that included:
- Custom React components that are production-ready
- Easy-to-copy code blocks and import statements
- Variant documentation and pre-configured options
- Usage guidelines with clear do's and don'ts for engineers and product partners
Storybook became the technical source of truth alongside Figma.
component-library.impact:
- Reduced design–engineering back-and-forth during implementation
- Improved reuse of existing components over custom builds
- Faster onboarding for engineers new to the system
- Saved prompting credits and reduced time to fully refined prototypes
component-library.learnings: The biggest gains came from documentation, not just components. Clear examples, usage rules, and do/don't guidance reduced misinterpretation and rework.
component-library.whatsNext: Expanding Storybook's role in AI-assisted development workflows and connecting components into workflows using MCP servers.

design-advocates.title: Design Advocacy Program
design-advocates.subtitle: Created a program to upskill product managers in design thinking and reduce dependency on centralized design resources.
design-advocates.role: Founder and Architect of the Design Advocates Program
design-advocates.tldr: I created a program to upskill product managers in design thinking and reduce dependency on centralized design resources.
design-advocates.problem: With AI tools enabling faster creation, product managers transitioned into hybrid Product Lead roles responsible for design decisions without sufficient training, leading to inconsistent quality and bottlenecks.
design-advocates.solution:
Established a Design Advocacy Program that:
- Embedded experienced designers as 'Design advocates' within product suites
- Introduced weekly design-aligns with weekly themed principles and pattern-focused critiques
- Created feedback loops to identify tooling and system gaps
design-advocates.impact:
- Supports 40+ product leads in building stronger design judgment

- Reduced reliance on centralized design reviews for early-stage work

- Improved pattern consistency and usability across teams
design-advocates.learnings: Design quality scales more effectively through education than enforcement. Regular critique and coaching built confidence faster than centralized reviews.
design-advocates.whatsNext: Formalizing the advocacy curriculum and pairing it more closely with AI-assisted design tools.

template-library.title: Figma Make Templates
template-library.subtitle: Designed high-fidelity templates that enabled faster, more consistent AI-assisted prototyping by non-designers.
template-library.tldr: Designed high-fidelity templates that enabled faster, more consistent AI-assisted prototyping by non-designers.
template-library.problem: AI-assisted design tools increased speed but introduced risk: inconsistent layouts, poor hierarchy, and off-system UI. Non-designers struggled to adjust AI outputs to align with established patterns.
template-library.solution:
Created a library of Figma Make templates that:
- Encoded design system standards
- Provided structure for common product flows
- Acted as guardrails for AI-generated design work
template-library.impact:
- Reduced prototype creation time from days to hours
- Improved consistency of AI-generated outputs
- Increased confidence for PMs creating high-fidelity prototypes
template-library.learnings: Large, heavily prompted files often caused context drift. Smaller, focused prototypes with intentional context resets produced more reliable, system-aligned results.
template-library.whatsNext: Deeper integration with upstream product discovery and prioritization workflows to ensure prototypes are generated from well-defined problems.

spec-catalyst.title: Spec Catalyst (v2)
spec-catalyst.subtitle: Led the evolution of a product discovery platform that connects customer signals to prioritized initiatives and AI-ready design workflows.
spec-catalyst.tldr: Led the evolution of a product discovery platform that connects customer signals to prioritized initiatives and AI-ready design workflows.
spec-catalyst.problem: PRDs were scarce and inconsistent. Customer signals were scattered across tools, leading to weak problem framing and rushed solutioning.
spec-catalyst.solution:
Spec Catalyst is a product discovery and specification platform that turns fragmented customer signals into clear, prioritized initiatives. It provides:
- A clear **Signal → Opportunity → Initiative** structure
- Simplified initiative definitions tied to customer pain and business goals
- Structured inputs designed to flow cleanly into AI-assisted design tools
Later iterations intentionally supported AI-assisted design and prototyping workflows.
spec-catalyst.impact:
- Improved clarity and prioritization of initiatives
- Reduced design exploration cycles from 1–2 weeks to 1–2 days
- Increased quality and relevance of downstream prototypes
spec-catalyst.learnings: Product outcomes are directly tied to problem framing quality. Clear structure reduced cognitive load and improved alignment. AI accelerates existing clarity—or amplifies ambiguity.
spec-catalyst.whatsNext: Closing the loop between shipped work and incoming signals, strengthening prioritization through clearer impact measures, and deepening integration with design and engineering tools.
